  • Constructor Details

    • MultiRoute

      public MultiRoute(List<Route> segments)
      The constructor of a multi route. It makes a copy of the segments, in order to ensure the immutability. It also calculates the length, in order to not have to call the method every time
      Parameters:
      segments - the segments that compose the route

  • Method Details

    • indexOfSegmentAt

      public int indexOfSegmentAt(double position)
      Return the index, at a given position. For doing that, we check every segment, and check if the clamped position is greater than the sum of the previous segment, plus the length of the actual segment. If it's the case, we are done, else, we redo the calculation
      Specified by:
      indexOfSegmentAt in interface Route
      Parameters:
      position - selected position
      Returns:
      the index of the segment at the position

    • length

      public double length()
      Calculate the length, by summing the length of all the route
      Specified by:
      length in interface Route
      Returns:
      the total length

    • edges

      public List<Edge> edges()
      Return all the edges, by fetching the edges of all the given route
      Specified by:
      edges in interface Route
      Returns:
      all the edges

    • points

      public List<PointCh> points()
      Return all the points, by looking at each route, and fetch all the point, except the last point, in order to not have two times the same point. And finally, we add all the point of the last route, including the last one this time
      Specified by:
      points in interface Route
      Returns:
      all the points

    • pointAt

      public PointCh pointAt(double position)
      Return the point at a certain position. For doing that we check for all the segment, if the length of all the previous segment, plus the actual segment is greater than the clamped position, and if it's the case we calculate the point at this position
      Specified by:
      pointAt in interface Route
      Parameters:
      position - the position
      Returns:
      the point at a certain position

    • elevationAt

      public double elevationAt(double position)
      Return the elevation at a certain position. For doing that we check for all the segment, if the length of all the previous segment, plus the actual segment is greater than the clamped position, and if it's the case we calculate the elevation at this position
      Specified by:
      elevationAt in interface Route
      Parameters:
      position - the position
      Returns:
      the elevation at a the position

    • nodeClosestTo

      public int nodeClosestTo(double position)
      Return the node closest to a certain position. For doing that we check for all the segment, if the length of all the previous segment, plus the actual segment is greater than the clamped position, and if it's the case we calculate the node closest to this position
      Specified by:
      nodeClosestTo in interface Route
      Parameters:
      position - the position
      Returns:
      the node closest to this position

    • pointClosestTo

      public RoutePoint pointClosestTo(PointCh point)
      Return the RoutePoint closest to a certain point. For doing that we go through all the route, and call the method min from RoutePoint, to check if a certain RoutePoint is smaller to an other one
      Specified by:
      pointClosestTo in interface Route
      Parameters:
      point - the point
      Returns:
      the closest RoutePoint
